name: Rimi Action RPG
description: Rimi Action RPG is a sandbox game based in an Action RPG enviroment. You have a open map guided by missions, and you have the freedom to choose what you want to do. You can play two different characters. Perfect game for otakus or RPG lovers, you can read further.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Supproted Storage: 100 MB available space
